questions.question_text: Which vSphere APIs support storage hardware acceleration?

choices.D: VMware vStorage APIs for Data Protection (VADP)
choices.A: VMware vSphere Storage APIs Array Integration (VAAI)

questions.question_text: Which DCUI option determines the time frame an administrator has to log in to the ESXi Shell after enabling the service?

A vSphere administrator is required to join all stateless ESXi hosts to an Active Directory domain for enhanced security.
Which utility would accomplish this?

discussion.content:
If a host is provisioned with Auto Deploy, Active Directory credentials cannot be stored on the hosts. You can use the vSphere Authentication Proxy
https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/7.0/com.vmware.vsphere.security.doc/GUID-63D22519-38CC-4A9F-AE85-97A53CB0948A.html

questions.question_text:
A vSphere Administrator wants to move a vCenter Server with an external Platform Services Controller from one SSO domain to another SSO domain.
Which option in cmsso-util will achieve this?

A cluster contains database VMs which have low utilization, except during a weekly data load that causes extremely high utilization. As DRS balances the VM load, there is an extended period of slow performance.
Which two actions could be taken to reduce the impact of the recurring data load? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: The newest approach is the Predictive Method, currently offered only through VMwareâ€˜s new Predictive DRS option. Predictive DRS using a combination of DRS and vRealize Operations Manager to predict future demand and determine when and where hot spots will occur.

choices.E: Enable Predictive DRS on the cluster.
choices.D: Enable Proactive HA on the cluster.
choices.A: Increase the number of vCPUs on the database VMs.
choices.C: Increase the RAM allocated to the database VMs.
choices.B: Enable VMware vRealize Operations Manager Integration with VMware vCenter.
